entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who owns a copy of Advanced Potion-Making. He snatches his book from the table when she lunges at it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend who helps him escape from the situation. She packed her things hastily and grabbed Harry by the arm to frogmarch him away.

entities.name: library
entities.description: The library is a place where people go to study and read books. The librarian might ban someone from the library if they are not careful.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person who works at the library. There might be something going on between Filch and the librarian.

relationships.description: The librarian might ban Harry from the library if he is not careful.
Hermione helped Harry escape from the situation by grabbing him by the arm and frogmarching him away.
There might be something going on between Filch and the librarian.
